name: Playful Intuitive Art Exploration
description: Playful Intuitive Art Exploration is a fun and exploratory drawing and painting class that gives folks an opportunity to express themselves creatively through creating art and connecting with their intuition. Using unique real-world images (centered around nature and microscopic photography) which incorporate interesting colors, textures, and shapes. You will learn basic drawing techniques using the elements of art and will be experimenting with abstract and representational concepts using your
